pr_title: Document how to use a random test port

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            `0` will yield a random port (assigned by the operating system).
          
          
            
            `0` will result in the use of a random port (assigned by the operating system).
timeline.author: geoand
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -150,6 +150,7 @@ You can configure the port used by tests by configuring `quarkus.http.test-port`
 ----
 quarkus.http.test-port=8083
 ----
+`0` will yield a random port (assigned by the operating system).

timeline.message: Document how to use a random test port
